channel.title: stock conversion on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in stock conversion on FinanClub

item.title: AMC
item.description: score:-34 Chances: AMC’s stock conversion process completes, potentially leading to more stable shares. Wedbush upgrades AMC’s rating amid stock conversion. AMC’s preferred shares conversion approved, allowing the sale of new shares. AMC receives go-ahead for APE stock conversion, despite stock plunge. Market anticipates stock conversion, causing AMC’s shares to tumble.

item.title: APE
item.description: score:50 Chances: AMC’s stock conversion is over, and analysts predict potential for more dilution. AMC’s stock conversion receives approval, allowing the company to sell nearly 400 million new shares. AMC CEO explains stock divide following court ruling. AMC Entertainment’s revised stock conversion plan gets approved by a judge.
